Home.title:
NORDIC NEUROLOGY
CONGRESS 2024
Home.description: «Nordic Neurology Congress 2024» is a prestigious, fictitious conference dedicated to promoting research and collaboration in neurology. It brings together leading experts, researchers and health personnel from all over the Nordics to discuss the latest news in neurological disorders, treatment techniques and ground-breaking research. The event aims to be a catalyst for innovation and knowledge sharing in the field of neurology, with a mix of lectures, workshops and networking opportunities.

entry01.event: «The neurology of the future - New perspectives and challenges»

entry05.event: «Use of AI in the diagnosis of neurological disorders»

entry01.event: «Genetics in neurology – Where are we going?»

entry05.event: «Virtual Reality as a treatment method in neurology»

entry07.event: «Next step for the Nordic neurology community»
